text: Hello guys I have a problem with cta's buttons, for multi language sites, Is there any way to create a variations for a specific button for example to french language? I don't want to create the new button only for the language since it won't have the submissions and click records

Hey <@U07EX5K0KDW>, multi-language is supported only with legacy CTAs.
to create translations, simply select "add multivariante version" in the "actions" dropdown
